mapper.select: select token.id, token.active_token, token.revoked, token.grant_type, token.client_id, token.expires_at, token.created_at from token join auth_code_token on auth_code_token.token_id = token.id where auth_code_token.auth_code_id = #{authCodeId}
select token.id, token.active_token, token.revoked, token.grant_type, token.client_id, token.expires_at, token.created_at from token where token.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into token (id, active_token, grant_type, client_id, revoked, expires_at) values ( #{token.id}, #{token.token}, #{token.grantType}, #{token.clientId}, #{token.revoked}, #{token.expiresAt, typeHandler=net.tokensmith.authorization.persistence.mapper.typehandler.OffsetDateTimeTypeHandler} )
mapper.update: update token set revoked = true from auth_code_token, auth_code where auth_code_token.token_id = token.id and auth_code.id = auth_code_token.auth_code_id and auth_code.id = #{authCodeId}

update token set revoked = true from resource_owner_token where resource_owner_token.token_id = token.id and token.expires_at > current_timestamp and resource_owner_token.resource_owner_id = #{resourceOwnerId}
